name: Yatadera's Gift
desc: Can activate "Lethal Life Flow", multiplying all stats except Con and Mov by 1.1x + 0.1x for every Magic unit in a 2 tile radius of the user. When there are no Magic units near the user, the user consumes 2 more fatigue per attack. Magic units near the user suffer 2 Fatigue every time the user enters combat.
